name: Spirits of Seder
description:
The game is made for the NaNoReNo 2022. 

This is a visual novel game set in a fictitious world where you play as Antonio Washbern, the middle-aged archaeologist striving for recognition. Haunted by the Spirits of Seder, you journey through the Enki Desert to uncover their mystery.

--------------------------------------

Theme

Uncover the secrets hidden deep beneath the ancient ruins of the Seder Empire, and learn about the spirits haunting your dreams.

Mysterious evil spirits haunt your dreams, their intentions are not fully known but they are capable of bringing great destruction and chaos.

--------------------------------------

Setting and Backstory

The game is set in a fictitious world, closely resembling the history and geography of Earth. 

The story begins in Antonio’s bedroom, as he dreams of making a great archaeological discovery. This takes place in an apartment in a well-developed country.  

The remainder of the story takes place in a desert inspired by the Middle-East called the Enki Desert. Antonio will be searching for ruins similar to that of Mesopotamian civilizations in this desert, known as the Seder Empire.

-------------------------------------- 

The Game is developed by these amazing Developers and Artists: 

- Iman (@CloudCloak_Iman) (Programmer, Writer)

- Mupix (@mupixl) (Background Artist)

- Spyu (@spyu_art) (Writer)

- Myst (Writer)

- Lucky (@Lucky90Happy) (Sprite Artist)

Credits: 

 -------------------------------------- 

Engine:
